text: Khīṇā jāti vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparaṃ itthattāyā ti pajānātī ti
edit: Khīṇā jāti vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparaṃ itthattāyā ti pajānātī ti

translations.transtext: [One] knows clearly thus, "[Further] birth was exhausted, the religious life was fulfilled, what should be done was done, [and] there is no other [work] for being here [on earth again]."
